alert.note: Alert for Dent; Oregon; Phelps; Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 23 at 1:31PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM CDT SUNDAY THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of east central and south central Missouri, including the following counties, in east central Missouri, Phelps. In south central Missouri, Dent, Oregon and Shannon. * WHEN...From 1 AM CDT Sunday through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Several waves of showers and thunderstorms causing excessive rainfall will occur on Sunday. One to three inches of rainfall is expected with this system with the heaviest rainfall Sunday night. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
